import pandas as pd
df =  pd.read_excel('IPL_2023 _Points_Table.xlsx')

xls = pd.ExcelFile('IPL_2023 _Points_Table.xlsx')
IPL_2023_Points_Table = pd.read_excel(xls, 'IPL_2023_Points_Table')
Gujarat_Titans = pd.read_excel(xls, 'Gujarat_Titans')
Rajasthan_Royals = pd.read_excel(xls, 'Rajasthan_Royals')
Lucknow_Super_Giants = pd.read_excel(xls, 'Lucknow_Super_Giants')
Chennai_Super_Kings = pd.read_excel(xls, 'Chennai_Super_Kings')
Royal_Challengers_Bangalore = pd.read_excel(xls, 'Royal_Challengers_Bangalore')
Punjab_Kings = pd.read_excel(xls, 'Punjab_Kings')
Mumbai_Indians = pd.read_excel(xls, 'Mumbai_Indians')    
Kolkata_Knight_Riders = pd.read_excel(xls, 'Kolkata_Knight_Riders')
Sunrisers_Hyderabad = pd.read_excel(xls, 'Sunrisers_Hyderabad')
Delhi_Capitals = pd.read_excel(xls, 'Delhi_Capitals')
